hw3

Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • hw3.Sprite
      • hw3.MovableSprite
        • hw3.Projectile

  • public class Projectile
extends hw3.MovableSprite
    This class contains the information needed to render a projectile onto the screen. It includes gravity and whether or not it is a ballistic projectile. It extends the abstract class MoveableSprite
    Author:
    Michael Lux

    • Constructor Detail

      • Projectile

        public Projectile(double x,
                  double y,
                  int width,
                  int height,
                  hw3.Renderer givenRenderer)
        Constructs a projectile with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        x - top left horizontal location
        y - top left vertical location
        width - the width of the explosion
        height - the height of the explosion
        givenRenderer - the screen in which the explosion will appear
